 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂבַר‎</span>] **verb** ==inspect, examine== ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁבֵר‎</span> [so [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">συντρίβων</span>], but Masoretic <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> see [[BDB#Norzi|Norzi]]; hence connection with Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***probe*** a wound, ***try, examine***, improbable, and this (according to [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>261</sup>) denominative from Aramaic loan-word; improbable also is connection with Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְבַר‎</span> ***think*** (compare following), [[BDB#Kau|Kau]]<sup>Aramaic in AT, 85</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂבֵר‎</span>, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> object, [[Neh.2.13|Neh 2:13]]; [[Neh.2.15|Neh 2:15]] I ***examined into*** the wall, inspected it closely. 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂבַר‎</span>] **Pi\`el** ==wait, hope== (Aramaism; compare Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְבַר‎</span> think, Pa\`el ***hope***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***believe, hope***, Pa\`el ***think***, Aph\`el ***hope***); — ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂבַּרְתִּי‎</span> [[Ps.119.166|Ps 119:166]], 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂבְּרוּ‎</span> [[Esth.9.1|Esth 9:1]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשַׂבְּרוּ‎</span> [[Isa.38.18|Isa 38:18]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשַׂבֵּ֑רוּ‎</span> [[Ps.145.15|Ps 145:15]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשַׂבֵּר֑וּן‎</span> [[Ps.104.27|Ps 104:27]] 2 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּשַׂבֵּרְנָה‎</span> [[Ruth.1.13|Ruth 1:13]] — 

**1.** ***wait*** for, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person, [[Ruth.1.13|Ruth 1:13]]. 

**2.** ***hope*** for, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of thing [[Ps.119.166|Ps 119:166]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> of thing [[Isa.38.18|Isa 38:18]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person [[Ps.104.27|Ps 104:27]]; [[Ps.145.15|Ps 145:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> infinitive [[Esth.9.1|Esth 9:1]] ***hope to rule***.
